author: hollowstrawberry
description: Translate messages using Google Translate for free. Supports context menu commands.
install_msg:
ðŸŽŒ __**EasyTranslate**__ ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load easytranslate
2. Enable application commands with [p]slash enablecog easytranslate
3. Sync application commands with [p]slash sync
4. You may need to restart Discord to see the new commands.
5a. To translate a message for yourself, right click it -> Apps -> Translate
5b. Your users may set their default language for translation with /setmylanguage
5c. Your users may use /translate to send a public message in a different language.```
short: Translate messages using Google Translate for free. Supports context menu commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
